properties.comment: Generic query mapping for SQL databases
properties.entry: CREATE TABLE meandre_job_status (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), status CHAR(1) default 'U', ts timestamp, PRIMARY KEY(server_ID,job_ID))
CREATE TABLE meandre_job_console (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), print VARCHAR(32672), ts timestamp)
CREATE TABLE meandre_job_log (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), level CHAR(32), log VARCHAR(32672), ts timestamp)
UPDATE meandre_job_status SET status=?, ts = CURRENT TIMESTAMP WHERE server_ID=? and job_ID=?
UPDATE meandre_job_status SET status=?, ts = CURRENT TIMESTAMP WHERE server_ID=? and status=?
